A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well filmed and had a few good moments but the use of one-liners was a bit too much but far worse was the total flop of a storyline\, failure to address various questions and some gigantic plot holes you could hide a star destroyer inside. The more I think about it\, the more disappointed I am in this wasted opportunity and the irreparable damage done to what has come before. A beautifully shot\, well acted abomination.
